description: Explore the rise of Doodles, a successful indie NFT project. Discover their community-centric approach, innovative monetization strategies, and the role of indie hacking in their success in the dynamic NFT landscape.
keywords: Doodles, NFT, indie hacking, blockchain, community-centric, digital art, monetization strategies, collaboration, storytelling, decentralized governance, indie projects
title: Doodles: Indie Hacking Success Stories from the NFT Realm
